channel.title: Alch and assassin
channel.description: So was watching old tol videos and saw alch used to have a day ability that blurs a person's view for 15 seconds i was thinking it might be time for it to return but not just for alch for assassin to replacing distract as it would be more helpful then making someone unable to talk for 10 seconds

item.title: Alch and assassin
item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
Well i mean we could remove a night shade or 2 to make up for changing distract

Read full topic

item.title: Alch and assassin
item.dc:creator: anon98616575
item.description:
It will probably never be added back to the Alchemist. It was exclusively used for confirming yourself as Alchemist, and it wasn’t even effective.

Assassin buff, maybe. Assassin is already pretty powerful though.

Read full topic

item.title: Alch and assassin
item.dc:creator: TinyDeer
item.description:
This is an interesting change for distract - it would be interesting if in addition to getting silenced for 10-15 seconds, they will need to also gather their bearings afterwards. I feel like assassin is in a pretty good spot right now, but this would be a good potential buff to keep in mind.

Read full topic

item.title: Alch and assassin
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I would prefer a silent Distract buff, but would be okay with this.
